message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product not only stands as a testament to innovation but also promises unparalleled performance and durability. Considering its unique features and benefits, I believe it's truly worth more than its face value. I kindly propose to offer it to you at an exclusive price of $15000. This is a special opportunity tailored specifically for you, reflecting the product's value and its potential impact on your endeavors. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
